version_description:
Bug fixes.

We know it's only been a few days, but we're constantly raising the bar.

Yep. :)

Chartistic has been featured in over 30 countries. Thank you all so much for the love! We have received a lot of great feedback and we want you to know that we are listening. Watch this space for updates.

In this release, meanwhile, Chartistic gets

- 追溯到 16 世纪，小数点的引入革命性地推动了数学的发展。我们同样期待 Chartistic 的引入，也会带来革命性的改变。
- 如果您不想要水印，我们已经设置了隐藏功能。
- 该应用还支持中文（简体和繁体）语言。
- 因此，请与我们一起欢迎这个被 Apple 评选为 2016 年度最佳的软件-Chartistic！

A: Do you think we have to remove the ‘Bug’ Clip arts from our app?
B: Why do you feel that way?
A: Because we fixed the bugs.

1. We have brightened up our color palette so, your pie charts look more livelier.

2. We have revamped our design throughout the app to create a neater and cleaner interface.

3. You can now export charts with either a black or a white backg

We heard you!
Chartistic has strived to help create beautiful Charts on your iPhone so far and now we are extending this to iPads too. Enjoy creating stunning Charts with ease on your iPad.
We look forward to your feedback!
